major.name: Free Faller
major.description: Become Immune to fall damage.

major.name: Dasher
major.description: Increase tactical sprint duration.

major.name: Stalker
major.description: Walk faster while aiming

minor.name: Hard Target
minor.description: While tactical sprinting, projectile damage is reduced.

minor.name: Quarterback

minor.name: Retaliation
minor.description: Deal bonus damage while health is low.

minor.name: Hardened Plates
minor.description: Armor plates have more damage mitigation.

minor.name: Durable Plates

minor.name: Quick Swap
minor.description: Swap weapons faster.

minor.name: Fast Pitcher
minor.description: Deploy equipment faster.

description: Increase the variety of loot dropped by enemies

minor.name: EOD Technician

minor.name: Tribologist
